content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL; warning: "out of fuel"; source holds 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS; fuel inventory contains coal; furnace result holds 6 copper plates; energy: 1600.0.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs (research: automation); status: NO_POWER; electrical_id: 4600.
- ElectricityGroup with id=4600 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5) and (8.5, 6.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(2.5, 21.5) intended for power generation; status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]; connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5); neighbours include pipes at (3.5, 23.5), (4.5, 23.5) and (2.5, 24.5).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) for steam production; status: NO_FUEL; warning: "out of fuel"; fluid_box holds approximately 200 units of water at 15°; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); fluid_system: [15932]; steam_output_point at (-7.5, 24.5); neighbours include adjacent pipes.
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction; status: WORKING; connection point at (-9.5, 23.5); fluid_box holds 100 units of water at 15°; fluid_system: [15932]; neighbours include adjacent pipes.
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=15932 at approximately (-6.5, 20.5); status: WORKING.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=15933 at approximately (-2.5, 20.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=15934 at approximately (-0.5, 21.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=15939 at approximately (-3.5, 23.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=15938 at approximately (-7.5, 25.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=15943 at approximately (3.5, 25.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=15942 at approximately (2.5, 24.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=15945 at approximately (-0.5, 28.5); status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────
• Fluid System Connection Failures:
  - Repeated connection attempts to supply water to the steam engine using PipeGroups with fluid_system IDs [14556, 14599, 14642, 14685, 14728, 14771, 14814, 14857, 14900, 14943, 14986, 15029, 15072, 15115, 15158, 15201, 15244, 15287, 15330, 15373, 15416, 15459, 15502, 15545, 15588, 15631, 15674, 15717, 15760, 15803, 15846, 15889] have all failed. Verify that the selected PipeGroup exists, is active, and that its fluid_system ID matches the current pipeline network configuration (e.g., 15932).

• Inefficient Pipeline Stabilization:
  - Replace fixed 10-second wait intervals with dynamic status checks to reduce idle time and improve pipeline network stabilization.
